definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Keep these animals out of the fields.
sentences.chinese: 別讓這些動物進莊稼地裏去。

sentences.english: Many fwristers left the land for jobs in town.
sentences.chinese: 許多農民離開莊稼地到城裏去找管事。
